content: MP-US OC Pipe strap Outdoor coated (OC) pipe strap for universal piping applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for suspended or standing installation applications Designed for use with open channel profiles, closed girders and bracket arms Approved for sprinkler applications under VdS Approved for sprinkler applications under UL / NFPA Applications Universal pipe fixation up to 12 Single-point fastening for sprinkler applications Installation of non-insulated pipes in industrial environment ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: DX51D-ZM300 - EN 10346:2015 Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - ZM Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Material composition | DX51D-ZM300 - EN 10346:2015 | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - ZM | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2288314 - Pipe strap MP-US 18 3/8 OC - Package Size 40 pc - 2288315 - Pipe strap MP-US 22 1/2 OC - Package Size 40 pc - 2288316 - Pipe strap MP-US 28 3/4 OC - Package Size 40 pc - 2288317 - Pipe strap MP-US 34 1 OC - Package Size 20 pc - 2288318 - Pipe strap MP-US 43 1-1/4 OC - Package Size 20 pc - 2288319 - Pipe strap MP-US 49 1-1/2 OC - Package Size 20 pc - 2288370 - Pipe strap MP-US 61 2 OC - Package Size 20 pc - 2288371 - Pipe strap MP-US 77 2-1/2 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2288372 - Pipe strap MP-US 90 3 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2288373 - Pipe strap MP-US 102 3-1/2 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2288374 - Pipe strap MP-US 115 4 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2288950 - Pipe strap MP-US 139 5 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2288376 - Pipe strap MP-US 169 6 OC - Package Size 2 pc - 2288377 - Pipe strap MP-US 221 8 OC - Package Size 2 pc - 2288378 - Pipe strap MP-US 275 10 OC - Package Size 2 pc - 2288379 - Pipe strap MP-US 326 12 OC - Package Size 2 pc
